attributes.action: stop his plans to allow council tax inspecters the right to enter & photograph a persons home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM should abolish his plans to allow council tax inspecters the right to enter & photograph peoples homes for coucil tax evaluation
this is morally wrong , an invasion of privacy .
So where are our human rights to privacy in our own homes!
This imformation could be open to abuse!After all the local councils allready hold plans of every dwelling in thier boroughs!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
